job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description:
If you are a Senior Software Engineer with experience, please read on!
We are an employee owned company in the simulation space that is responsible for providing software solutions to both government and commercial industries! If you are looking for a great company with a ton of career growth and the chance to work on very interesting projects than this is the role for you! We offer a strong compensation package, are employee owned ( so what you say and do is actually implemented), great leadership team and a ton of career growth opportunities!
What You Will Be Doing
Design and develop new customer facing applications
develop critical software components
Lead the testing of developed subsystems
Manage the software configuration
Assist in the development of test plans.
What You Need for this Position
So, if you are a Senior Software Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Keith.Ellis@CyberCoders.com
Keith Ellis - Recruiting Manager - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
